attributes.action: Tax Payers subsided Trips Isle Wight
attributes.additional_details: When every Government Department has budget cuts and armed forces have lost their jobs we call on all Government Departments Ministers, Civil Servants to show restraint in how they spend Tax Payers money. The people involved in the 6 day team building trip to the Isle of Wight Regatta should refund all costs and pay they received from their own money.  And all these type of "Team Building" trips should cease immediately.
